name: Petit Game Collection vol.1
description:
"Petit Game Collection vol.1" is a spin-off minigame collection of "Needy Streamer Overload".



In Volume 1,
we are featuring 3 mini-games that receive inspiration
from good old retro bishōjo games!

There's just something about ""retro"" that you can't feel elsewhere...
So go give it a try!

Game Contents




■Ame's Happy Happy Dating Game
A retro-style visual novel,
where you get to experience a rare date scene that can't be seen in the main game.
Take Ame to a nice place and give her the time of her life!


■Don't Die, Kangel!
A rogue-like shooting game.
After ariving at the scene of everyone's favorite anime convention,
what awaited our lovely internet angel were some filthy otakus... ew!
It's an angel's job to keep herself and the convention filth-free, so get shooting with... huh?!


■Break Out Kangel
A game for the cultured.
Oh no, our internet angel is stuck in some blocks!
Break the blocks to reveal... *cough* ...help her out!
*This mini-game can only be played in Japanese.


■KAngel's Room
Full of staff comments and inside stories. A must read for NSO fans.
